Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. George:

Text.Language: Sasf n~rompi afjokou e~bol: n~je v/eyouab Gewrgioc: e~re pis~be n~ouro n~a~nomoc: eu]hap e~rof m~m/ni.
Saint George completed, seven whole years, being judged daily, by seventy lawless kings.
